plot: The very popular Romanian series continues, this time with a police comedy. Ionica is mistaken for a drug dealer and arrested, and his friends try to discover and uncover the truth.
title: Liceenii în alerta
plot_es: The very popular Romanian series continues, this time with a police comedy. Ionica is mistaken for a drug dealer and arrested, and his friends try to discover and uncover the truth.
